ResearchProjectDef.label: Advenced Prosthetic
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create basic artificial intelligence systems for combat assistance. This technology allows the development of simple neural AI that can enhance a soldier's combat performance without overwhelming their neural pathways.
